Helen Lieros (mkpụrụ Ụbọchị atọ nke ọnwa Ọgọst n' afọ 1940 - ụbọchí irí na anọ nke ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2021) bụ onye na-ese ihe nkiri Zimbabwe
A mụrụ ya na Gweru, Zimbabwe maka nne na nna bụ ndị Gris
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Ecole des Beaux-Arts na Center Contemporaine de la Gravure (ugbu a Centre d'édition contemporaine
Ọ nọkwara ọtụtụ oge na Istituto statale d'arte di Firenze [ ya ] na Florence, Italy
Mgbe ọ na-agagharị na Europe, Lieros laghachiri na Zimbabwe (mgbe ahụ Rhodesia ) na 1964 wee nweta ọkwa dịka onye nkuzi na Chaplin High School, ebe ọ gụbụrú akwụkwọ
Ọ kwagara Harare (mgbe ahụ Salisbury ) n' afọ 1967, ebe o biri ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na mkpụrụ Ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Julaị  n' afọ 2021.
Lieros bụ otu n'ime ndị omenkà akachasị mara amara na Zimbabwe ma nwee ọrụ ruru  mgbà afọ iri isii
O guzobere Gallery Delta na Harare ya na di ya Derek Huggins n' afọ1975
Oghere nọọrọ onwe ya etinyela aka na nhazi, nhazi, ngosi na nkwalite ihe ngosi ruru ihe dịka narị narị ise
E wezụga itinye ego n'ọrụ nke ya, Lieros na di ya raara onwe ha nye ihe ka ukwuu n'ọrụ ha nkuzi na ịkụzi ọgbọ ndị na-ese ihe Zimbabwe
Ndị a gụnyere Berry Bickle, Greg Shaw, Lovemore Kambudzi, Cosmas Shiridzinonwa, Gina Maxim, Misheck Masamvu,   Admire Kamudzengerere, Richard Mudariki,  na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Na mbido  afọ 2021, National Arts Council nke Zimbabwe kwanyere Lieros ugwu ka ọ bụrụ ihe ngosi onyinye onyinye mba
